kaluthara palathota thekkawaththe pihituwa athi aananda amarasinha wayowruddha bhikshu gilan wiwekashramaya wayowruddha gilan bhikshunwahanseta sewana ha rakawaranaya salasana punya madhyasthanayak bawata pathwa thibe.mehi danata rogiwa sitina wayowruddha bhikshunwahanse wisinamak newasikawa wada sitithi.1999 wasaredi palathota thekkawaththe pihiti samastha lanka bauddha maha sammelanaya sathu godanagili parishraye mema bhikshu gilan wiwekashramaya aarambha kara atha.ehi wiwekashramadhipathi lesa itha kapawimen ha shraddhawen yuthuwa katayuthu karanu labanne payagala malegoda sirinandana thripitaka dharmayathana piriwene pariwenadhipathi palathota panynyananda swaminwahanseya.1999 sita me dakwa wayowruddha bhikshunwahanse hatadenamak mehi newasikawa apa upasthana laba atha.kaluthara disthrikkaye wiharasthanawalin wiwekashramaye katayuthuwalata sahaya labadena bawath meya thawath pululwa diyunu karaganima sandaha bauddha danapathiyange aadhara upakara awashyawa athayi da panynyananda himiyo sandahan kalaha..
mema jiniwa barapathala abhiyogaya jaya ganima sandaha sinhale samangiya awashyaya.

palamuwa waliweriya siddiya salaka balamu.mehidi samanya janathawa wisin sidukala udghoshanayakata hamudawa wisin jiwa unda yodagena wedi thaba atha.wedi wadimen thidenekuta jiwitha ahimi wu athara wishala pirisakata thuwala sidu wiya.miya giya thidenagen ek ayeku sewaya nimawa niwasa bala yamin siti gampola pradeshaye padinchikaruweku wana athara anek dedena upakaraka panthi nimawa niwasa bala yamin siti sisun dedeneki.puduma siduwima nam hamuda madhya prakashakawarayata anuwa mowungen bahutharaya thuwalawi ha miyagos aththe gal paharawal walata lakwima nisaya.ee anuwa waliweriya paththe janathawata gal gasima pilibandawa aruma puduma hakiyawak atha.manda owunge gal paharawal walin minis sharira pawa hil wana bawini.
